thread.title: Astronauts have read 'The Martian,' now can't wait for movie - The New Zealand Herald
thread.title_full: Astronauts have read 'The Martian,' now can't wait for movie - The New Zealand Herald - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: The New Zealand Herald
title: Astronauts have read 'The Martian,' now can't wait for movie - The New Zealand Herald
text:
" The book "The Martian" is earning high praise from space, and the astronaut-reviewer can't wait to see the soon-to-be-released movie. NASA astronaut Kjell Lindgren said Tuesday from the International Space Station that both he and crewmate Scott Kelly have read the novel by Andy Weir.
 The New Zealand Herald.
